title: Issue Patching Game
body: My Patcher keeps going over the limit it says and has gone as far as 1gb over, how did i fix this? thank you

replies.body:
Going over the limit as in downloading more files than it says it needed? Strange....I'm curious as to if that patch ever finished? If not it probably is a sign that your connection went dormant during the patch and the patcher wasn't actually downloading anything. 

If you still haven't gotten that patch downloaded, go ahead and do some basic troubleshooting by following the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). It has a lot of fixes for common issues, and it's good to test each one in a custom/practice game first.
